author: felicity
msg: bug 1982: add support for RBL+, disabled by default.

author: felicity
msg: bug 2086: Make it possible for people (especially developers and people who will run
mass-check after 2.60 is released) to log real-time DNS responses.
This is particularly important for SenderBase since SenderBase results change
from day-to-day, but it will also help us improve our assessments (hit rate,
false positives, etc.) of the current set of RBL rules.
